commentSuffixArr.cn: 战略性新兴产业、高技术产业（服务业）、农业及相关产业、数字核心产业、养老产业、绿色低碳转型产业的分类具有置信度等级：
commentSuffixArr.en: The classification of strategic emerging industries, high-tech industries (services), agriculture and related industries, core industries of the digital economy, aging industry, and green low-carbon transition industries has confidence levels:

commentSuffixArr.cn: 1：基于官方文件直接分类，具有高关联性；
commentSuffixArr.en: 1: Directly classified based on official documents, with high relevance;

commentSuffixArr.cn: 2：结合企业主营特征等公开数据分类，具有较高关联性；
commentSuffixArr.en: 2: Classified by integrating public data such as enterprises main business characteristics, with relatively high relevance;

commentSuffixArr.cn: 3：结合企业主营特征等公开数据分类，具有较低关联性。
commentSuffixArr.en: 3: Classified by integrating public data such as enterprises main business characteristics, with relatively low relevance.

commentSuffixArr.cn: 报告中仅展示等级1、2的产业分类，若想查看全部置信度分类产业，请在企业详情页查看。
commentSuffixArr.en: Only industry classifications of levels 1 and 2 are displayed in the report. For viewing all confidence-level classifications, please check the detailed page of the enterprise.
